CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K.

 

 

Dear All, 

 

We have received from Axa France the email in French and below our free translation. Please let us have your quick reply : 

 

I understand that the effective date of the local policy must be as soon as possible. 

 

In addition, the effective date of 04/12/2024 is not possible given that:

chunks.text:
- Let us have the names, addresses, email addresses of the local contacts of the local partner (local broker) and of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. 

   This information is essential so that we can communicate the instructions to Axa local partner;

 

- Once the local contact is made between your local broker and our local partner as well as between your local broker and CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K., the local policy issued by our local partner as well as the premium invoice will be sent to CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. - The local       Property policy of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. will take effect once the premium is received by our local partner. Can you please get the 3-year claims statistics of the old local policy of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K.?

 

 

- As mentioned on the phone, local regulations in Japan are specific, it is a "cash before cover" country, meaning that the local policy will only take effect after the actual receipt of the premium by the local insurer. 

 

-Furthermore, it is a country that is very exposed to natural events: storms, floods, earthquakes. Consequently, the guarantees will be reduced for these events and a significant additional premium will be collected for these events.

 

We remain at yoiur entire disposal for any infoi needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

 

All the best . 

 

Joe Nasr

 



 

Email from external sender. 

 

Bonjour Joe,

 

Je comprends que la date d’effet de la police locale doit être au plus tôt. Par ailleurs, la date d’effet au 04/12/2024 n’est pas possible étant donné que :

chunks.text:
*	La police locale Property de CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. prendra effet une fois que la prime sera réceptionnée par notre partenaire local.

 

Pouvez-vous SVP obtenir la statistique sinistre sur 3 ans de l’ancienne police locale de CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. ?

 

*	Comme évoqué au téléphone, la règlementation locale au Japon est spécifique, c’est un pays « cash before cover » c’est-à-dire que la police locale prendra effet uniquement après la réception effective de la prime par l’assureur local.

Par ailleurs, c’est un pays très exposé aux évènements naturels : tempête, inondations, tremblements de terre. 

 

Par conséquent, les garanties seront réduites pour ces évènements et une surprime importante sera perçue au titre de ces évènements.

metadata.doc_id: CTTD5GG - tr re re tr - re japan - insurances christofle japan k.k\Conversation.txt

Par conséquent, les garanties seront réduites pour ces évènements et une surprime importante sera perçue au titre de ces évènements.

CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K.

 

 

Dear All, 

 

We have received from Axa France the email in French and below our free translation. Please let us have your quick reply : 

 

I understand that the effective date of the local policy must be as soon as possible. 

 

In addition, the effective date of 04/12/2024 is not possible given that:

chunks.text:
- Let us have the names, addresses, email addresses of the local contacts of the local partner (local broker) and of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. 

   This information is essential so that we can communicate the instructions to Axa local partner;

 

- Once the local contact is made between your local broker and our local partner as well as between your local broker and CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K., the local policy issued by our local partner as well as the premium invoice will be sent to CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. - The local       Property policy of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. will take effect once the premium is received by our local partner. Can you please get the 3-year claims statistics of the old local policy of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K.?

 

 

- As mentioned on the phone, local regulations in Japan are specific, it is a "cash before cover" country, meaning that the local policy will only take effect after the actual receipt of the premium by the local insurer. 

 

-Furthermore, it is a country that is very exposed to natural events: storms, floods, earthquakes. Consequently, the guarantees will be reduced for these events and a significant additional premium will be collected for these events.

 

We remain at yoiur entire disposal for any infoi needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

 

All the best . 

 

Joe Nasr

*	Comme évoqué au téléphone, la règlementation locale au Japon est spécifique, c’est un pays « cash before cover » c’est-à-dire que la police locale prendra effet uniquement après la réception effective de la prime par l’assureur local.

Par ailleurs, c’est un pays très exposé aux évènements naturels : tempête, inondations, tremblements de terre.

chunks.text:
Bonjour Monsieur,

 

*	Mrs Battini : statistique sinistres de l’ancienne police locale Property de CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. ;  JN:  this is not blocking but it will allow us to negotiate the best rates. 
*	noms, adresses, coordonnées emails des contacts locaux de votre partenaire local (courtier local)   : JN It is compulsory to have this info Please ask the previous owner ; If you want, I can intervene just give me the details.  
*	- As mentioned on the phone, local regulations in Japan are specific, it is a "cash before cover" country, meaning that the local policy will only take effect after the actual receipt of the premium by the local insurer. 

 

 

Nous n’avons pas ces informations (mais aucun sinistre ne nous a jamais été remonté). 

Il faut partir de 0.

 

Thank you to revert.

All the best 

 

Joe Nasr

Objet : TR: [EXTERNAL] RE: RE: TR: - RE: JAPAN - Insurances / Christofle Japan K.K.

 

CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K.

 

 

Dear All, 

 

We have received from Axa France the email in French and below our free translation. Please let us have your quick reply : 

 

I understand that the effective date of the local policy must be as soon as possible.

metadata.doc_id: CTTD5GG - tr re re tr - re japan - insurances christofle japan k.k\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
- Let us have the names, addresses, email addresses of the local contacts of the local partner (local broker) and of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. 

   This information is essential so that we can communicate the instructions to Axa local partner;

 

- Once the local contact is made between your local broker and our local partner as well as between your local broker and CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K., the local policy issued by our local partner as well as the premium invoice will be sent to CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. - The local       Property policy of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. will take effect once the premium is received by our local partner. Can you please get the 3-year claims statistics of the old local policy of CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K.?

 

 

- As mentioned on the phone, local regulations in Japan are specific, it is a "cash before cover" country, meaning that the local policy will only take effect after the actual receipt of the premium by the local insurer. 

 

-Furthermore, it is a country that is very exposed to natural events: storms, floods, earthquakes. Consequently, the guarantees will be reduced for these events and a significant additional premium will be collected for these events.

 

We remain at yoiur entire disposal for any infoi needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

 

All the best . 

 

Joe Nasr

 



 

Email from external sender. 

 

Bonjour Joe,

 

Je comprends que la date d’effet de la police locale doit être au plus tôt. Par ailleurs, la date d’effet au 04/12/2024 n’est pas possible étant donné que :

metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CTTD5GG - tr re re tr - re japan - insurances christofle japan k.k\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
*	La police locale Property de CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. prendra effet une fois que la prime sera réceptionnée par notre partenaire local.

 

Pouvez-vous SVP obtenir la statistique sinistre sur 3 ans de l’ancienne police locale de CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. ?

 

*	Comme évoqué au téléphone, la règlementation locale au Japon est spécifique, c’est un pays « cash before cover » c’est-à-dire que la police locale prendra effet uniquement après la réception effective de la prime par l’assureur local.

Par ailleurs, c’est un pays très exposé aux évènements naturels : tempête, inondations, tremblements de terre. 

 

Par conséquent, les garanties seront réduites pour ces évènements et une surprime importante sera perçue au titre de ces évènements.

metadata.doc_id: CTTD5GG - tr re re tr - re japan - insurances christofle japan k.k\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Par ailleurs, c’est un pays très exposé aux évènements naturels : tempête, inondations, tremblements de terre. 

 

Par conséquent, les garanties seront réduites pour ces évènements et une surprime importante sera perçue au titre de ces évènements.

Objet : RE: [EXTERNAL] RE: RE: TR: - RE: JAPAN - Insurances / Christofle Japan K.K.

 

Dear Mrs Battini, 

Our reply to your email below : 

 

Bonjour Monsieur,

 

*	Mrs Battini : statistique sinistres de l’ancienne police locale Property de CHRISTOFLE JAPAN K.K. ;  JN:  this is not blocking but it will allow us to negotiate the best rates. 
*	noms, adresses, coordonnées emails des contacts locaux de votre partenaire local (courtier local)   : JN It is compulsory to have this info Please ask the previous owner ; If you want, I can intervene just give me the details.  
*	- As mentioned on the phone, local regulations in Japan are specific, it is a "cash before cover" country, meaning that the local policy will only take effect after the actual receipt of the premium by the local insurer. 

 

 

Nous n’avons pas ces informations (mais aucun sinistre ne nous a jamais été remonté). 

Il faut partir de 0.

*	noms, adresses, coordonnées emails des contacts locaux de votre partenaire local (courtier local)   : JN It is compulsory to have this info Please ask the previous owner ; If you want, I can intervene just give me the details.  
*	- As mentioned on the phone, local regulations in Japan are specific, it is a "cash before cover" country, meaning that the local policy will only take effect after the actual receipt of the premium by the local insurer.

Thank you to revert.

All the best 

 

Joe Nasr
